Package main.java.controller

Class WallController

java.lang.Object
main.java.controller.WallController
public class WallController
extends java.lang.Object
Objects of this class creates a wall of bricks
Author:
Emily

  • Constructor Details

    • WallController

      public WallController​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, java.awt.Point ballPos)
      Constructor to create a wall class
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area of the wall
      brickCount - the amount of bricks
      lineCount - the amount of lines
      brickDimensionRatio - the ratio of the brick shape
      ballPos - the coordinates of the point of the ball

    • ballEnd

      public boolean ballEnd()
      Method to determine if the balls left is 0
      Returns:
      True if the number of balls left is 0, False if the number of balls left is more than 0

    • isDone

      public boolean isDone()
      Method to determine if the game is done Game is done when the number of bricks left is 0
      Returns:
      True if the number of bricks left is 0, False if the number of bricks left is more than 0
